name: wera2netcdf
raw_recipe:
package:
    name: wera2netcdf
    version: 0.0.4

source:
    fn: wera2netcdf-0.0.4.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/w/wera2netcdf/wera2netcdf-0.0.4.tar.gz
    md5: e0e34c8477c849d0aea9b64b04ff1395

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python
        - pandas
        - netcdf4
        - pygc
        - pytz
        - python-dateutil

test:
  imports:
    - wera2netcdf
    - wera2netcdf.tests
  requires:
    - pytest

about:
  home: https://github.com/axiom-data-science/wera2netcdf
  license: MIT License
  summary: A utility to convert WERA total ASCII files into CF NetCDF files.

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - kwilcox
        - ocefpaf

about.summary: A utility to convert WERA total ASCII files into CF NetCDF files.
